_instructions.note: DO NOT TRANSLATE ANY TEXT INSIDE {{CURLY_BRACES}} or MARKDOWN LINKS [TEXT](URL) or emojis <:emoji:1231231231232> or slash commands </commannd name:123512442423>. These are variables used by the bot code.
_instructions.note2: DO NOT TRANSLATE 'Waterfall', this is the bot's nickname and shouldn't be translated unless the context is the actual word Waterfall.

error: An error occurred while executing the command.
timeout_error: The operation timed out. Please try again later.

pagination.expired: This session has expired. Please run the command again.
pagination.only_user: Only the user who ran the command can use these buttons.

truncated_output: Output truncated for length. Use a more specific word or part of speech for more detail.
offensive_warning: This word may be considered offensive or inappropriate.
no_permission: You are not allowed to do this.

games.already_in_game: You're already in an active game!
games.already_challenged: You already have a pending challenge. Please wait for it to be accepted or decline it yourself.
games.challenger_busy: The challenger is now in another game.
